unitCommand.name: Enable Accident Reconstruction Logging
unitCommand.help: Enable Accident Reconstruction Logging

unitCommand.name: Verify Ignition On
unitCommand.help: Only write accident reconstruction records if ignition is ON

unitCommand.name: Verify Speed
unitCommand.help: Set this bit to verify that the selected speed of the vehicle is greater than required minimum

unitCommand.name: Minimum Required Speed
unitCommand.help: Minimum Speed at which any accident reconstruction records will be written if this option is selected

unitCommand.name: Accident Reconstruction Log
unitCommand.help: Use Flash 1 or Data Flash Card for the Accident Reconstruction Log

unitCommand.name: SMS Fallback Timer
unitCommand.help: Fallback Timer for SMS Communications Medium

unitCommand.name: GPRS Fallback Timer
unitCommand.help: Fallback Timer for GPRS Communications Medium

unitCommand.name: Roaming SMS Fallback Timer
unitCommand.help: Fallback Timer for Roaming SMS Communications Medium

unitCommand.name: Roaming GPRS Fallback Timer
unitCommand.help: Fallback Timer for Roaming GPRS Communications Medium

unitCommand.name: CM4 Fallback Timer
unitCommand.help: Fallback Timer for Communications Medium 4

unitCommand.name: CM5 Fallback Timer
unitCommand.help: Fallback Timer for Communications Medium 5

unitCommand.name: CM6 Fallback Timer
unitCommand.help: Fallback Timer for Communications Medium 6

unitCommand.name: CM7 Fallback Timer
unitCommand.help: Fallback Timer for Communications Medium 7

unitCommand.name: User CM Preference Order
unitCommand.help: Preference order of communications mediums usage as selected by user

unitCommand.name: Periodic Scanning
unitCommand.help: Periodic time in minutes where events for all communications mediums are scanned and sent if over that communications medium if enough events exist

unitCommand.name: Enable All Debug
unitCommand.help: Switch all debug statements ON or OFF

unitCommand.name: Enable Info Debug Messages
unitCommand.help: Enable Info Debug Messages

unitCommand.name: Enable Warning Debug Messages
unitCommand.help: Enable Warning Debug Messages

unitCommand.name: Enable Error Debug Messages
unitCommand.help: Enable Error Debug Messages

unitCommand.name: Enable Box Leds
unitCommand.help: Enable Box Leds

unitCommand.name: Trace Level
unitCommand.help: This is the level of trace information that would be sent to the debug port

unitCommand.name: Module Debug Mask
unitCommand.help: Enable debug statements for a specific Module

unitCommand.name: Driver Key Start Time out
unitCommand.help: Driver key time out before trip start

unitCommand.name: Driver Key End Time out
unitCommand.help: Driver key time out after trip end

unitCommand.name: Fleet Code
unitCommand.help: Fleet code assigned to the MHub

unitCommand.name: Vehicle Class
unitCommand.help: Vehicle class the MHub is installed into

unitCommand.name: Driver Key Bitmask
unitCommand.help: Driver Key Enable mask: 1: Enable Immobilisation

unitCommand.name: Customer Driver ID 1
unitCommand.help: Customer Driver ID 1

unitCommand.name: Customer Driver ID 2
unitCommand.help: Customer Driver ID 2

unitCommand.name: Customer Driver ID 3
unitCommand.help: Customer Driver ID 3

unitCommand.name: Customer Driver ID 4
unitCommand.help: Customer Driver ID 4

unitCommand.name: Customer Driver ID 5
unitCommand.help: Customer Driver ID 5

unitCommand.name: Customer Driver ID 6
unitCommand.help: Customer Driver ID 6

unitCommand.name: Customer Driver ID 7
unitCommand.help: Customer Driver ID 7

unitCommand.name: Customer Driver ID 8
unitCommand.help: Customer Driver ID 8

unitCommand.name: Input Delay
unitCommand.help: Delay for Input Event Generation

unitCommand.name: Default Delay 2
unitCommand.help: Default Delay 2 to be used in Event Generation

unitCommand.name: Default Delay 3
unitCommand.help: Default Delay 3 to be used in Event Generation

unitCommand.name: Excess Acceleration and Harsh Braking Delay

argument.name: Excess Acceleration and Harsh Braking Delay

unitCommand.help: Delay used for Excess Acceleration and Harsh Braking Event Generation

unitCommand.name: Output Delay
unitCommand.help: Delay used for Output Changed Event Generation

unitCommand.name: Excess Idle Delay
unitCommand.help: Delay used for Excess Idle Event Generation

unitCommand.name: Minimum Speeding Time
unitCommand.help: Minimum time of excessive speed before a Speeding Event is generated

unitCommand.name: Minimum Excess RPM Time
unitCommand.help: Minimum time of excessive RPM before a Excess RPM Event is generated

unitCommand.name: Specific Event Enable
unitCommand.help: Global Enable and Disable of Events

unitCommand.name: Geofence Entry and Exit debounce
unitCommand.help: Geofence Entry and Exit debounce ensure that travelling on the boundary of the geofence does not cause exsessive entry and exit events

unitCommand.name: Geofence Scanning Enabled
unitCommand.help: Geofence Scanning enabled or not

unitCommand.name: Geoloc Radius
unitCommand.help: Geoloc Radius in meters

unitCommand.name: Geoloc Debounce Time
unitCommand.help: Time the unit need to be outside the geoloc before a breach is triggered

unitCommand.name: Enable Geoloc Functionality
unitCommand.help: Switch the Geoloc functionality ON and OFF

unitCommand.name: Data Link Escape Enable
unitCommand.help: Enables the use of the Data Link escape character. This should not be disabled.

unitCommand.name: GPRS Domain Name Server Address
unitCommand.help: Domain Name Server IP address

unitCommand.name: External Modem Control Time
unitCommand.help: The amount of time that an external entity will be allowed control of the modem.

unitCommand.name: Access Point Node
unitCommand.help: Access Point Node identifier e.g. internet

unitCommand.name: APN User Name
unitCommand.help: GSM Network supplied APN User Name

unitCommand.name: APN Password
unitCommand.help: GSM Network supplied APN Password

unitCommand.name: Server IP Address
unitCommand.help: The IP address of the server that the external device wishes to open a socket to. This may be in the form of an IP address or URL in which case there must be a valid DNS IP configured.

unitCommand.name: TCP Port ID
unitCommand.help: TCP Port through which the socket will be opened to third party server.

unitCommand.name: External Control Hold State
unitCommand.help: The amount of time that the MHub will wait after a socket has closed before taking back control of the modem.

unitCommand.name: External Socket Maximum allow time
unitCommand.help: The maximum amount of time that the MHub will allow control of the socket to be handled by an external device. When this timer has expired the socket will be closed. If a new request is initiated the socket will be immediately re-opened.

unitCommand.name: External Modem Control Enable
unitCommand.help: Enables control of the modem to be given over to an external device

unitCommand.name: External Socket Enable
unitCommand.help: Enables the opening of a socket before control is handed over to the external device

unitCommand.name: External PDP Context
unitCommand.help: PDP Context that must be used for the external socket. Note that all external socket settings will be written into this context. It should be different from the PDP context used by the socket used by the unit.

unitCommand.name: Maximum External Silence Time
unitCommand.help: Maximum time that there may be no traffic on the external modem interface before the MHub takes back control of the modem.

unitCommand.name: GPRS Domain Name Server Address
unitCommand.help: Domain Name Server IP address

unitCommand.name: Access Point Node
unitCommand.help: Access Point Node identifier e.g. internet

unitCommand.name: APN User Name
unitCommand.help: GSM Network supplied APN User Name

unitCommand.name: APN Password
unitCommand.help: GSM Network supplied APN Password

unitCommand.name: SMS over GPRS
unitCommand.help: Allows selection of GPRS SMS or Circuit switched SMS. This should not be changed from the default value unless there are network reasons. If this is changed SMS\'s will not work if there is no GPRS !

unitCommand.name: SMS Reference
unitCommand.help: This is set by the modem

unitCommand.name: SMS Validity Period
unitCommand.help: Validity time of a sent SMS.

unitCommand.name: SMS Protocol Identifier
unitCommand.help: Protocol identifier byte.

unitCommand.name: SMS 7 bit coding scheme
unitCommand.help: 7 bit SMS coding Scheme

unitCommand.name: SMS 8 bit coding scheme
unitCommand.help: 8 bit SMS coding scheme

unitCommand.name: SMS Message Retry
unitCommand.help: Number of times that an SMS must be retried

unitCommand.name: SMS International TON
unitCommand.help: International Type of number value

unitCommand.name: SMS National TON
unitCommand.help: NAtional type of number

unitCommand.name: SMS PDU or Text
unitCommand.help: Sets SMS to PDU or Text mode.

unitCommand.name: Last dial out MSISDN
unitCommand.help: Storage area for number about to be used for voice call completion

unitCommand.name: Last Received SMS
unitCommand.help: MSIDSN of last received SMS

unitCommand.name: Last Transmitted SMS
unitCommand.help: MSIDSN of last transmitted SMS

unitCommand.name: Service Centre Address (1)
unitCommand.help: Primary Service Centre Address

unitCommand.name: Service Centre Address (2)
unitCommand.help: Secondary Service Centre Address.

unitCommand.name: Service Centre Address (3)
unitCommand.help: Tertiary Service Centre address

unitCommand.name: Service Centre Address (4)
unitCommand.help: Service centre address

unitCommand.name: SMS Destination Address
unitCommand.help: The destination address of the next sms to be sent. This excludes event report sms\'s

unitCommand.name: Maximum Message Completion time
unitCommand.help: This is the maximum amount of time that the unit will wait, after receiving a header, for the rest of a message to be received.

unitCommand.name: Maximum Socket Login Attempts
unitCommand.help: The maximum number of attempts that a unit may make to login, before tearing down the socket.

unitCommand.name: Socket Transmission Timeout
unitCommand.help: The time that the (N)Ack may take to reach the MHub before the related transmission attempt expires.

unitCommand.name: Socket Block Time
unitCommand.help: The amount of time that establishment of a socket will be blocked after a socket is deliberately closed to allow for incoming voice or data calls.

unitCommand.name: Maximum Socket Transmission Attempts
unitCommand.help: Maximum number of attempts the MHub will make to transmit a packet before the socket is torn down. The message is also failed.

unitCommand.name: Data Link Escape Enable
unitCommand.help: Data Link escape enable

unitCommand.name: Socket Pre-Suspend Pause
unitCommand.help: Amount of time that the socket will wait before suspension so that current transactions are allowed to complete.

unitCommand.name: Connection Type
unitCommand.help: Sets the connection behaviour of the socket. 0 = No socket; 1 = Temporary, 2 = Permanent ; 3 = Invalid (will be interpreted as permanent socket)

unitCommand.name: Enable Suspend
unitCommand.help: Enables suspension of a socket for maintenance purposes

unitCommand.name: Enable Socket Close
unitCommand.help: Enables the unit to close a socket so that voice and data calls may be dealt with

unitCommand.name: Socket Suspend Time
unitCommand.help: Maximum amount of time that the GPRS socket may be suspended for the modem to take care of other tasks e.g handling SMS\'s

unitCommand.name: Socket Suspend Period
unitCommand.help: Number of seconds between successive suspends, i.e. Periodic suspend period

unitCommand.name: Enable Suspend Report
unitCommand.help: Enables the generation of notifications to MProfiler when a socket is suspended

unitCommand.name: Enable Socket Close Report
unitCommand.help: Enables the generation of notifications to MProfiler when a socket is closed.

unitCommand.name: Enable Resume Report
unitCommand.help: Enables the generation of notifications to MProfiler when a socket is resumed after a suspend.

unitCommand.name: Enable Power State Report
unitCommand.help: Enables the generation of notifications to MProfiler when the power state of the 801 changes.

unitCommand.name: Auto Answer Ringcount
unitCommand.help: Number of rings before modem auto answers. 0 switches this feature off

unitCommand.name: Last Received Call
unitCommand.help: MSIDSN of last incoming call

unitCommand.name: Voice Number 1
unitCommand.help: Voice Number 1

unitCommand.name: Voice Number 2
unitCommand.help: Voice Number 2

unitCommand.name: Voice Number 3
unitCommand.help: Voice Number 3

unitCommand.name: Voice Number 4
unitCommand.help: Voice Number 4

unitCommand.name: Voice Number 5
unitCommand.help: Voice Number 5

unitCommand.name: External Voice dialing Enabled
unitCommand.help: Enable voice dialing from an external command

unitCommand.name: Incoming Voice Melody
unitCommand.help: Melody alert for incoming voice call

unitCommand.name: Incoming Voice Melody Volume
unitCommand.help: Volume of the ringer for incoming voice alerts

unitCommand.name: Enable System Log
unitCommand.help: Enable the system log

unitCommand.name: Wismo Indication
unitCommand.help: Wismo status indication enable state

unitCommand.name: SIM PIN
unitCommand.help: Sim PIN

unitCommand.name: Calling Line Identification
unitCommand.help: Switches the calling line identification on or off. This allows the unit to know the origin of a voice or data call.

unitCommand.name: Modem No-Network Restart Delay
unitCommand.help: The amount of time that the unit will wait after rebooting the modem before repeating the process when GSM registration fails.

unitCommand.name: Reboot Limit
unitCommand.help: Maximum number of times that the modem can be soft rebooted before it is power cycled

unitCommand.name: Error Limit
unitCommand.help: Maximum number of accumulated errors before the modem is rebooted

unitCommand.name: Cell Result Code
unitCommand.help: Enables extended reporting on incoming call type

unitCommand.name: Data Rate Report
unitCommand.help: Enables report of data rate of established data call

unitCommand.name: Flow Control DCE-by-DTE
unitCommand.help: DTE invokes flow control through RTS

unitCommand.name: Flow Control DTE-by-DCE
unitCommand.help: DCE invokes flow control through CTS

unitCommand.name: Service Reporting
unitCommand.help: Enables reporting of type of Data call that has been established

unitCommand.name: Character Framing Format
unitCommand.help: Data, parity and stop bit format

unitCommand.name: Character Framing Parity
unitCommand.help: Type of parity.

unitCommand.name: Incoming Default Call
unitCommand.help: Sets the incoming call bearer when none is given by the network. Ref AT command set documnetation for value meanings. Defaults to voice.

unitCommand.name: SMS Check Period
unitCommand.help: Number of seconds between checking for messages during maintenance cycles

unitCommand.name: Net Info Check Period
unitCommand.help: Number of seconds between checking net information during maintenance cycles

unitCommand.name: External AT Command Run Time
unitCommand.help: The amount of time that an AT command from outside the MHub will be allowed to complete execution before the MHub gathers the response.

unitCommand.name: Incoming Fax Melody
unitCommand.help: Incoming fax call alert.

unitCommand.name: Incoming Data Melody
unitCommand.help: Incoming data call alert melody.

unitCommand.name: Enable Modem Hardware Flow Control
unitCommand.help: Configures hardware flow control between the modem and the processor. 1 - Flow control on; 0 - Flow control off. Should be used in conjunction with the modem\'s internal flow control settings.

unitCommand.name: SMS Transmission Timeout
unitCommand.help: The amount of time that the MHub will wait for to modem to transmit a message before deciding to carry on.

unitCommand.name: Incoming SMS Melody
unitCommand.help: Incoming SMS alert.

unitCommand.name: GSM Major Firmware Version
unitCommand.help: Firmware version of the firmware running on the Wismo

unitCommand.name: Error Correction
unitCommand.help: Data Call error correction

unitCommand.name: Data Call Bearer speed
unitCommand.help: Data call bearer baud rate.

unitCommand.name: Data Call Connection Element
unitCommand.help: Transparency of connection

unitCommand.name: GPRS Registration Status Message
unitCommand.help: GPRS Unsolicitied Status Message setting

unitCommand.name: GPRS Mode
unitCommand.help: Sets TCP stack to work over GPRS or datacall

unitCommand.name: GPRS PDP Context
unitCommand.help: Sets the PDP context that the modem must use.

unitCommand.name: TCP Transmission Delay
unitCommand.help: Delay between the modem receiving a character and transimitting a TCP frame

unitCommand.name: DTR Suspend Active
unitCommand.help: Causes the unit to use the DTR line to suspend a socket and put the unit into command mode instead of +++

unitCommand.name: Stack Major Version
unitCommand.help: Major version of the stack that is running on the Wismo module. This should be set to zero, the module will then correct it.

unitCommand.name: Audio Channel Selection
unitCommand.help: Speaker and microphone channel selection.

unitCommand.name: Audio Transmission Gain
unitCommand.help: Sets the transmission gain.

unitCommand.name: Audio Reception Gain
unitCommand.help: Sets the Audion reception gain.

unitCommand.name: Audio Echo Cancellation Echo Vol Out

argument.name: Audio Echo Cancellation Echo Vol Out

unitCommand.name: Audio Echo Cancellation Pcm Threshold Max

argument.name: Audio Echo Cancellation Pcm Threshold Max

unitCommand.name: TCP Port ID
unitCommand.help: TCP Port through which the socket will be opened

unitCommand.name: TCP Socket Login Timeout
unitCommand.help: The amount of time that the unit will allow a login challenge to go unanswered before retrying.

unitCommand.name: MProfiler User Name
unitCommand.help: User name used when logging onto MProfiler over a TCP socket.

unitCommand.name: MProfiler User Password
unitCommand.help: Password used to log onto a TCP socket session with MProfiler.

unitCommand.name: MProfiler MSISDN
unitCommand.help: MSISDN of the MProfiler SMS Gateway.

unitCommand.name: Text SMS Destination MSISDN
unitCommand.help: Destination MSISDN for Text messages

unitCommand.name: MProfiler IP
unitCommand.help: MProfiler IP address

unitCommand.name: OBC RPM Loop
unitCommand.help: OBC RPM Timer Prescaler

unitCommand.name: OBC RPM Calibration
unitCommand.help: OBC RPM Calibration Value

unitCommand.name: OBC ODO Loop
unitCommand.help: OBC ODO Timer prescaler

unitCommand.name: OBC ODO Calibration
unitCommand.help: OBC ODO Calibration Value

unitCommand.name: Speed Limit
unitCommand.help: The speed limit in km/h

unitCommand.name: RPM Limit
unitCommand.help: RPM limit at which point an exception is occuring

unitCommand.name: Position Report Interval
unitCommand.help: The period between sucessive periodic position reports during a trip

unitCommand.name: Disable Speed Threshold
unitCommand.help: This value indicate the maximum speed threshold at which point it is safe to disable a vehicle

unitCommand.name: Braking Limit
unitCommand.help: Braking Limit in km/h/s

unitCommand.name: Acceleration Limit
unitCommand.help: Acceleration Limit in km/h/s

unitCommand.name: Non Trip Position Delay
unitCommand.help: Periodic Position while a trip is not in progress

unitCommand.name: Enable Extra Inputs and Outputs
unitCommand.help: Enable Extra Inputs on MCP251x

unitCommand.name: OBC Free Wheeling Debounce
unitCommand.help: OBC Free Wheeling Debounce

unitCommand.name: Free Wheel RPM Threshold
unitCommand.help: RPM High limit for Free Wheel condition

unitCommand.name: Speed Free Wheel Threshold
unitCommand.help: Speed minimum limit for Free Wheel condition

unitCommand.name: Auto Calibration Activation
unitCommand.help: Auto Calibration Activation

unitCommand.name: Auto Calibration Speed Threshold
unitCommand.help: Auto Calibration Speed Min Speed

unitCommand.name: Auto Calibration Debounce
unitCommand.help: Auto Calibration Debounce debounce time in seconds

unitCommand.help: MHub Description

unitCommand.name: Tacho Graph Report Interval
unitCommand.help: Tacho Graph Reporting Interval

unitCommand.help: Output Style for Output 1: 0 - Normal, 1 - Timed, 2 - Progressive, 3 - Pattern

unitCommand.help: Output Style Repeat Count 1 for Timed Outputs

unitCommand.help: 0: RTC Time Offset 1: RTC Periodic Offset 2: RTC HH:MM Offset

unitCommand.help: This is the time in seconds the unit should stay ON after the wakeup event was sent

unitCommand.help: Maximum on time in seconds with ignition on

unitCommand.name: Maximum ON Time
unitCommand.help: Maximum time in seconds the unit should stay ON when something causes any of the logic not to work out
